question_text: A user wants to upgrade their power supply. Which TWO of the following are valid reasons to choose a higher wattage unit? (Select two)
answer_options: To improve the speed of the operating system
To accommodate a new high-end graphics card
To reduce the power supplyâ€™s physical size
To provide headroom for future component upgrades
To eliminate the need for CPU cooling
correct_answer: To accommodate a new high-end graphics card
To provide headroom for future component upgrades
explanation: Higher wattage units support additional hardware and future upgrades. They do not directly affect performance or eliminate thermal needs.
